title: Password Reset Successful
successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset! You can now log in to your SlotFinder account using your new password.
successBoxText: Your password has been successfully reset! You can now log in to your SlotFinder account using your new password.
securityMessage: Your account security has been updated and you can now access all SlotFinder features with your new credentials.
securityTip1: Use a strong, unique password for your SlotFinder account
securityTip2: Don't share your password with anyone
securityTip4: If you notice any suspicious activity, contact us immediately
supportMessage: If you didn't request this password reset, please contact our support team immediately. Your account security is important to us.
footerNote: If you continue to have problems, contact us at support@slotfinder.com
footerSecurity: This is an automated message, please do not reply to this email.
